alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln; Logan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 16 at 9:40PM CDT until September 17 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN...SOUTH CENTRAL LOGAN AND WESTERN CUSTER COUNTIES... At 940 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northeast of Maxwell, or 18 miles southeast of Stapleton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Lincoln, south central Logan and western Custer Counties. This includes Highway 92 near mile marker 239. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
